Html:
At this link: http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=VersionNotes

is possible read:

Current Release: Rawr 5.0.3

But on the download page is available only the version 5.0.2, so i don't understand, it is about 2 weeks that on the realease note page there is the 5.0.3, maybe is there an other link to download the 5.0.3 version?

 

I ask this because i need:

Rawr.Mage:
- Fix for base stats.
- Support for T14 set bonuses.
- Support for frost spec.

I understand that there are delay for the new release, but at least an answer in 2 week.

the web Page of the release note say version 5.0.3, but we can download only 5.0.2.. WHY?
